title: API: Get single tick
description:
GET /api/ticks/:id endpoint:
- Returns full tick JSON
- Include notes parsed as array
- Include blocker details (title, status of each blocker)
acceptance_criteria:
- GET /api/ticks/:id returns tick JSON
- Notes parsed into array with timestamps
- Blockers include title and status
- 404 for unknown ID
closed_reason: Added GET /api/ticks/:id endpoint to server.go. Returns full tick JSON with notesList (parsed from Notes string with timestamp/author/text fields) and blockerDetails (ID, title, status for each blocker). Missing blockers are handled gracefully with placeholder values. Modified handleTickActions to route single-tick GET requests. Added parseNotes helper function and comprehensive tests.
